rows.label: qst202008_msg001
rows.name: Thank you. Dinner's almost ready now.

rows.label: qst202008_msg002
rows.name:
Would you mind asking Dofusay about
where to put the firewood?

rows.label: qst202008_msg102
rows.name:
He hasn't asked you to go on one of
his choclit-grabbing errands, I hope?

rows.label: qst202008_msg0201
rows.name:
Ah, that brings back memories...
I used to eat these all the time.

rows.label: qst202008_msg0202
rows.name:
You don't see much of them around
these days...

rows.label: qst202008_msg0203
rows.name:
But how did you know I liked these rice
balls?

rows.label: qst202008_msg0204
rows.name:
Ahh, so Dofusay told you...
I see what's going on here.

rows.label: qst202008_msg0205
rows.name:
He asked you to buy him some
choclit, didn't he?

rows.label: qst202008_msg0207
rows.name: He thought he could fool me, did he...

rows.label: qst202008_msg0208
rows.name:
Honestly, I don't know what to do with
that man any more. I'll have to give him
a proper telling off.
